text: The Arizona Wildcat is a 1927 American western film directed by Roy William Neill and starring Tom Mix, Dorothy Sebastian and Ben Bard.Jensen p.234 ==Cast== * Tom Mix as Tom Phelan * Dorothy Sebastian as Regina Schyler * Ben Bard as Wallace Van Acker * Cissy Fitzgerald as Mother Schyler * Bill Elliott as Roy Schyler * Monte Collins as Low Jack Wilkins * Doris Dawson as Marie * Marcella Daly as Helen Van Acker == References == == Bibliography == * Jensen, Richard D. The Amazing Tom Mix: The Most Famous Cowboy of the Movies. 2005. == External links == * Category:American films Category:1927 Western (genre) films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Roy William Neill Category:1927 films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Fox Film films
title: The Arizona Wildcat (1927 film)
